pr_title: ISSUE_524: Fix spelling and punctuation in some areas in 'Console Producer and Consumer Basics' page

timeline.message: fix spelling and punctuation in a few areas on 'Console Producer and Consumer Basics, no (de) serializers page

timeline.bodyText: @gAmUssA Hi Viktor, can you help with this one line here? I saw this one line and wanted to see what we were meaning to say in the line? Looks we're missing a word or two. I can update it here and I'll remove the extra "." as well.
timeline.author: tikimims
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1,4 +1,4 @@
-Next let's open up a console consumer again, but this time you'll ready everthing that your producer has sent to the topic. you created in the previous step.
+Next let's open up a console consumer again, but this time you'll ready everything that your producer has sent to the topic. you created in the previous step.

replies.bodyText: Looks like . is indeed redundant but whole sentence is a pretty big and difficult to read. Feel free to split it.
replies.author: gAmUssA

replies.bodyText: Thanks @gAmUssA! I re-read the sentence and was getting tripped over one word. I'll implement your suggestion too - sounds good. Thanks so much!
replies.author: tikimims
